item.title: Laravel Containers in Fargate ECS
item.description: There’s a lot of code in PHP out there. Wordpress, Drupal, Zend Framework, Code Igniter, Laravel there are endless frameworks. PHP has conspicuously been left out of the buzzword rich serverless revolution. Strange, since roughly half of the internet is running PHP. Even the dying Ruby language has native AWS Lambda support. No PHP. That’s ok. I don’t care which language I am required to use on a project. However, I do care about a few favorite projects that I’ve written and maintained over the years that are being left behind.
